title: Subtle Sparkle Mangalsutra
features: Delicate rose gold chain adorned with interspersed black beads, featuring small, sparkling diamond simulant pendants in a teardrop shape. Clean, minimalist design suitable for everyday wear or layering.
description: This contemporary mangalsutra offers a modern twist on a traditional symbol of marriage. The delicate design makes it perfect for everyday wear, while the sparkling diamond simulant pendants add a touch of elegance. The rose gold provides a warm, romantic glow, enhancing the black beads for a striking yet subtle look.
